document.masterDocTitle: An overview of the Onthophagini from the Arabian Peninsula (Coleoptera: Scarabaeoidea: Scarabaeidae)

Distribution . Arabian Peninsula: Yemen ( Paulian 1948 ). Africa: Djibouti , Somalia (d’Orbigny 1898c), Eritrea (d’Orbigny 1904), Dahlak islands [ Eritrea ] ( Müller 1940 ), Ethiopia [“ Abyssinie ”] (d’Orbigny 1900).

Remarks . First record for
Saudi Arabia
.
